net.sf.mmm.search.indexer.base.state

Class SearchIndexerStateBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mmm.search.indexer.base.state.SearchIndexerStateBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SearchIndexerState

    public class SearchIndexerStateBean
extends Object
implements SearchIndexerState
    This is the implementation of SearchIndexerState as JAXB-ready Java-Bean.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

        public List<SearchIndexerSourceStateBean> getSources()

      • getSourceState

        public SearchIndexerSourceState getSourceState(String source)
        This method gets the SearchIndexerSourceState for the given source.
        For each configured source a source-state will be available.
        Specified by:
        getSourceState in interface SearchIndexerState
        Parameters:
        source - is the ID of the source for which the state is requested.
        Returns:
        the SearchIndexerSourceState of the given source or null if no such state exists.

      • getOrCreateSourceState

        public SearchIndexerSourceStateBean getOrCreateSourceState(String source)
        Parameters:
        source - is the source-ID for which the state is requested.
        Returns:
        the requested SearchIndexerSourceState. If it does not exist, it is created and associated.
        See Also:
        getSourceState(String)

      • getIndexingDate

        public Date getIndexingDate()
        This method gets the Date when the index had been updated last time. It will be set the the current Date every time this state is saved.
        Specified by:
        getIndexingDate in interface SearchIndexerState
        Returns:
        the last indexing date or null if the index did NOT exist before.

      • setIndexingDate

        public void setIndexingDate(Date indexingDate)
        This method sets the indexing-date.
        Parameters:
        indexingDate - is the new indexing-date.
